com.dhemery.configuring

Interface Configuration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransformingConfiguration

    public interface Configuration
    A set of named configuration options that can be queried and transformed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void define(String name, String value)
      Define an option with the given name and value.
      Set<String> names()
      Return the names of the options defined in this configuration.
      <T> T option(Feature<String,T> translator, String name, UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
      Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators and translated by the translator.
      String option(String name, UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
      Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators.

    • Method Detail

      • define

        void define(String name,
          String value)
        Define an option with the given name and value. Any previous definition of the option is lost.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the option
        value - the value of the option

      • names

        Set<String> names()
        Return the names of the options defined in this configuration.

      • option

        String option(String name,
            UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
        Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the option
        operators - the operators to apply to the configured value of the option
        Returns:
        the transformed value of the option

      • option

        <T> T option(Feature<String,T> translator,
           String name,
           UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
        Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators and translated by the translator.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which to translate the transformed option
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the option
        operators - the operators to apply to the configured value of the option
        translator - the translator to translate the option to the desired type
        Returns:
        the transformed value of the option, translated by the specified translator
